remarks: Value of composition of endomorphisms in a trace-preserving endomorphism.  (Contributed by NM, 9-Jun-2013.)
statement:
tendof.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
tendof.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
tendof.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
tendocoval $p |- ( ( ( K e. X /\ W e. H ) /\ ( U e. E /\ V e. E ) /\ F e. T ) -> ( ( U o. V ) ` F ) = ( U ` ( V ` F ) ) ) $.
